video.title: The League
video.synopsis: Fantasy football tackles reality in this semi-scripted look at some friends whose hobby provides an outlet in the form of trash-talking and deceit.

episodes.synopsis: The League is starting up again and the guys are preparing for the big draft, except Pete, whose wife thought he wasn't going to play this year.
episodes.title: The Draft

episodes.synopsis: Pete's split with Meegan has sent ripples of consequence through the group, and Ruxin tries to run interference.
episodes.title: The Bounce Test

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin invites everyone over on Sunday to watch the games, and his guests get much more lunch, and baby, than hoped for.
episodes.title: Sunday at Ruxin's

episodes.synopsis: Kevin enlists Taco to scare Ellie off her favorite toy while the guys join Pete on what was supposed to be his fifth anniversary spa trip.
episodes.title: Mr. McGibblets

episodes.synopsis: During playoffs, Pete and Kevin get stuck at an awful Christmas party, while Ruxin and Taco have a mission in Chinatown.
episodes.title: The Usual Bet

episodes.synopsis: It's the Shiva Bowl. The guys try to hide the Shiva trophy from their high school classmate -- the actual Shiva. Taco gets a "real person job."
episodes.title: The Shiva Bowl

episodes.synopsis: Andre, the reigning champ, has pulled out all the stops and hosts the draft in Las Vegas. When one member drops out, Jenny throws her hat in the ring.
episodes.title: Vegas Draft

episodes.synopsis: The married guys atone for Vegas: a weekend for Kevin and Jenny and a "Lady Day" for Ruxin and Sofia. The League is plagued by Ruxin's brother-in-law.
episodes.title: Bro-Lo El Cuñado

episodes.synopsis: While Andre brings in a new partner to expand his practice, Ruxin uses a sick kid to meet an NFL star, and Pete deals with dating Kevin's ex.
episodes.title: The White Knuckler

episodes.synopsis: Jenny and the guys reconnect with their old friend Russell, Andre buys an expensive painting, and everyone tries to get Rafi out of the League.
episodes.title: The Kluneberg

episodes.synopsis: While Andre and Pete train for a marathon and Taco finds a new career, Kevin's head-to-head matchup gets personal.
episodes.title: The Marathon

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin throws Sofia an anniversary party on the same day as Jenny's birthday. Meegan returns with a "plus one."
episodes.title: The Anniversary Party

episodes.synopsis: Kevin convinces everyone to come to the suburbs for Halloween. Ruxin cracks under the pressure of his matchup with Pete. Taco steals a monkey.
episodes.title: Ghost Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin and Andre refuse to accept a tie, Taco discovers Western medicine, and Pete has a line on great Bears tickets.
episodes.title: The Tie

episodes.synopsis: Andre is an expert witness in Ruxin's case but thinks Pete is trying to steal his thunder. Taco needs a nude portrait to impress the courtroom artist.
episodes.title: The Expert Witness

episodes.synopsis: It's the guys' high school reunion -- Andre is excited to show off his success, while Ruxin is excited to show off his hot wife.
episodes.title: High School Reunion

episodes.synopsis: It's the last week before the playoffs, and Andre's special diet makes him exceptionally emotional about his matchup.
episodes.title: Ramona Neopolitano

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas, and more importantly, it's the playoffs -- so tensions are running high.
episodes.title: Kegel the Elf

episodes.synopsis: It's the end of the season, and everyone in the League is vying for the Shiva and trying to avoid the dreaded Sacko.
episodes.title: The Sacko Bowl

episodes.synopsis: The terrible reign of Ruxin as League Champion continues while the guys devise a plan with Rafi and Dirty Randy for Andre's final Sacko punishment.
episodes.title: The Lockout

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is disappointed with their draft, but no one trusts each other enough to trade. Ruxin tries to get Baby Geoffrey into a Jewish preschool.
episodes.title: The Sukkah

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin hires a hot au pair and is afraid Taco will sleep with her, Andre explores online dating, and Kevin cheats on Jenny with ESPN's Matthew Berry.
episodes.title: The Au Pair

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin is so desperate to get rid of his au pair that he gets Rafi's help, and Pete learns a new sexual position -- then regrets it.
episodes.title: Ol' Smoke Crotch

episodes.synopsis: Jenny forgets an anniversary, Taco creates an offline social network called My Face, and the guys resurrect their old game of phone chicken.
episodes.title: Bobbum Man

episodes.synopsis: Taco competes in a jingle contest, Pete holds a grudge against a traffic cop, and Ruxin has a chance to work a big case with his boss.
episodes.title: Yobogoya!

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Jenny search for the perfect paint color, Sofia accuses Ruxin of breast favoritism, and Pete tries to defend his high school track record.
episodes.title: Carmenjello

episodes.synopsis: Thanksgiving is family time as Ruxin gets an unexpected visit from his father, and Andre's sister is on the prowl at the gang's Thanksgiving dinner.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: The guys are psyched for a visit from one of the League's out-of-towners, but he shows up much different than they remember. Taco goes on a diet.
episodes.title: The Out of Towner

episodes.synopsis: Kevin thinks his Krav Maga instructor may actually be into him, Jenny entrusts Andre with a secret, and the guys need to rescue Ruxin from a cult.
episodes.title: The Light of Genesis

episodes.synopsis: Pete's new girlfriend wants to help him with his lineup, Ruxin runs afoul of his company's email policies, and auto-correct gets everybody in trouble.
episodes.title: The Guest Bong

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Jenny make a bold bet on the play-offs, Taco enlists Ruxin to get more involved with Taco Corp., and Pete plans to send Ruxin to the Sacko.
episodes.title: St. Pete

episodes.synopsis: The race is on for the Shiva and the Sacko. But one of the guys can't manage his team for the game, leaving the League to figure out who'll run it.
episodes.title: The Funeral

episodes.synopsis: The League prepares for the draft and the arrival of Kevin and Jenny's baby boy. Taco's business dealings with Jerry Jones get the guys invited to the Dallas Cowboys' Training Camp.
episodes.title: Training Camp

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Jenny argue over whether or not their son will be circumcised and everyone takes sides - including Shiva.
episodes.title: The Hoodie

episodes.synopsis: Pete has a big paintball outing planned, but the married guys have to go to a kid's birthday party. Ruxin has a run in with a white sushi chef.
episodes.title: The Freeze Out

episodes.synopsis: Kevin and Jenny discover Kristin Cavallari is in their baby group. Taco realizes he may actually have a girlfriend. Ruxin needs Rafi to take his son to swim class. Not a good idea.
episodes.title: The Breastalyzer

episodes.synopsis: Kevin decides to run for judge and ends up at a charity event with Bills Quarterback Ryan Fitzpatrick. The guys take an intelligence test to decide who's the smartest. Andre refuses to believe he's balding.
episodes.title: Judge MacArthur

episodes.synopsis: Andre's plan to take the guys tailgating is thwarted when their high school nemesis Frank "The Body" Gibiatti and his gang have the same idea.
episodes.title: Tailgate

episodes.synopsis: Pete fights over a pair of shoes with a man in a wheelchair (JB Smoove). Taco teaches a dog to recognize the scent of sex. Jenny and Kevin get Ellie a piano.
episodes.title: The Vapora Sport

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin fears that Sofia has lost interest in their marriage. Meanwhile, Jenny makes a dirty trade.
episodes.title: The Anchor Baby

episodes.synopsis: Kevin has a colonoscopy. Later, Pete suspects that his grandpa (Robert Wagner) is adulterous; and the guys ask Rafi to settle a dispute for them.
episodes.title: Bro-lo El Cordero

episodes.synopsis: Kevin is blackmailed by Ellie's boyfriend, Taco helps Ruxin with his fertility issues, and Pete re-connects with his high school crush Gina Gibiatti (Brooklyn Decker).
episodes.title: Our Dinner with Andre

episodes.synopsis: Andre starts dating his interior decorator and discovers that the buyer of his old loft is Deion Sanders. Rafi and Dirty Randy (Seth Rogen) prepare for the end of the world.
Andre and Trixie's relationship is put to the test. Jenny and Pete make special offerings to Shiva. Rupert Ruxin (Jeff Goldblum) has a gift for his son while Taco challenges the Mall Santa.
episodes.title: A Krampus Carol

episodes.synopsis: Gina Gibiatti returns and Pete has a decision to make. Ruxin enlists Rafi to protect himself during Scrote Season. Taco Corp has a New Years Eve bash.
episodes.title: The Curse of Shiva

episodes.synopsis: The gang travels to Los Angeles for Andre and Trixie's destination wedding. Later, Ruxin quits to avoid his Sacko punishments.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Draft

episodes.synopsis: Andre's parents make an appearance. Meanwhile, Ruxin wrestles J.J. Watt for control of his fantasy team.
episodes.title: The Von Nowzick Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Pete tries to cheer up Andre with a little help from Snoop Dogg, and Taco gives away control of his team.
episodes.title: Chalupa vs. the Cutlet

episodes.synopsis: When their friend is murdered, Rafi and Dirty Randy head to Los Angeles to avenge his death.
episodes.title: Rafi and Dirty Randy

episodes.synopsis: After missing his flight for a business trip, Ruxin hides out in Chicago instead of going home.
episodes.title: The Bye Week

episodes.synopsis: Taco starts a petting-zoo business. Meanwhile, Kevin and Ellie rebel when Jenny tries to get her family to adopt a healthier lifestyle.
episodes.title: Heavy Petting

episodes.synopsis: Andre takes a stand-up comedy class. Elsewhere, Jenny joins a women's investment club.
episodes.title: The Bringer Show

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin's dog loses interest in Jenny, and Taco is forced to face life without marijuana.
episodes.title: Flowers for Taco

episodes.synopsis: Pete's workplace lineups are outperforming his fantasy roster. Meanwhile, Andre makes a trade with Jenny that could threaten his career.
episodes.title: The Automatic Faucet

episodes.synopsis: Taco opens an unusual barber shop. Later, Andre discovers that a patient's electronic voice box sounds exactly like Ruxin.
episodes.title: The Near Death Flex-Perience

episodes.synopsis: Ellie's basketball coach makes life tough on everyone. Meanwhile, Pete dates a married woman, and Andre tries to help with a trade.
episodes.title: The Credit Card Alert

episodes.synopsis: Ruxin and Sofia battle over baby Geoffrey's religion. Meanwhile, Kevin fears that he's been taking Jenny for granted.
episodes.title: Baby Geoffrey Jesus

episodes.synopsis: Andre confronts Chicago's top plastic surgeon. Meanwhile, Rafi tries to collect a debt from Ruxin's sister, and Taco launches a new enterprise.
episodes.title: The 8 Defensive Points of Hanukkah
